snippet: Police said Friday that thieves had stolen a considerable amount of maple syrup from a warehouse in Quebec, where 10 million pounds — about $30 million worth — is stored.
abstract: Police in Quebec say thieves stole a considerable amount of maple syrup from a warehouse where 10 million pounds--about $30 million worth--is stored.
lead_paragraph: Police said Friday that thieves had stolen a considerable amount of maple syrup from a warehouse in Quebec, where 10 million pounds — about $30 million worth — is stored.

headline.seo: Maple Syrup Theft Casts Pall Over Canadian Breakfast Plates
headline.main: Canada: A Theft Casts a Pall Over Breakfast Plates
headline.print_headline: Canada: A Theft Casts a Pall Over Breakfast Plates
